all_response:
Jax: You have been asked to copy the painting "Three Suns" by the master Degas. You do not know what the painting looks like so you'll need to go to the art museum where it is on display to copy it.  Before you start painting, you'll also need to purchase an art supply kit. There are three art supply kits available for purchase, for oil painting, watercolor painting, and sketching respectively, but you only have enough funds to buy one of these kits. The art supply kit contains all materials and tools needed for painting in that style. To recreate "Three Suns" accurately, you'll also need to use a special golden pigment, which you can obtain from Professor Henry at the art museum.
Jax: "Three Suns" is an oil painting, so your copy must also be an oil painting.
Jax: You need to go to Colorful Stationery Shop to buy the portable art supply kit. Other stationery stores do not sell these portable bags.
Jax: Professor Henry works at the National Art Gallery.
Jax: "Three Suns" is in the Lily Art Gallery, and you can enter freely.

all_response:
Jax: You need to paint a picture of a mountain to give to the princess in order to get in her good graces. To do this, you need to find out what the princess likes. As far as I know, the princess likes mountains that are high and have the most beautiful views. Also, before you set out to paint, you need to purchase the materials you need to paint.
Jax: You need to go to Colorful Realm Stationery Workshop to buy the materials for your painting. All you need to do is to buy a painting bag. The bag contains all the materials you need to paint in oil, watercolor, and drawing styles outdoors. Other stationery stores do not carry these kits.
Jax: The mountain you need to paint is Golden Snow Mountain, because that's the most beautiful and the princess likes it best. You can do it in the evening, it's the most beautiful time.
Jax: You need to paint an oil painting because oil paintings are the princess's favorite.

Other stationery stores do not sell this kind of kit, and the price of the kit is much cheaper than buying all the materials separately.

Jax: The mountain you need to paint is the Golden Snow Mountain, because the scenery there is beautiful and said to be the princess's favorite. You should go there in the evening to paint, to capture the mountain in the glistening evening light.
Jax: The princess has a particular appreciation for oil paintings.
